member.name: M:Litium.Foundation.Accounts.ActiveDirectory.ADGroup.Sync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Synchronizes the group with the Active Directory: - Updates the corresponding Foundation group with the AD display name. - If the AD group no longer exists, the corresponding Foundation group is disabled. - Checks that all members registred in Foundation still exist and that they are members of the group. If not, these users are removed from the memberships list.
member.param: Login name used to verify group against the Active Directory.
Password used to verify group against the Active Directory.

member.name: P:Litium.Foundation.Configuration.SearchConfiguration.PublicSiteFuzzySearchPrefixLength
member.summary: A positive number between 0 and int.MaxValue that regulates how many starting characters that needs to be identical when comparing an indexed term with a search term.

summary.para: A positive number between 0 and 1 that regulates the "fuzzyness" of a fuzzy query.
In order to generate a hit, the distance between an indexed term X and a search term Y must be less than:
The distance is measured in the number of additions, deletions or modifications needed for the terms X and Y to be identical.

member.name: M:Litium.Foundation.Data.MSSQL.DataProvider.HandleError(System.Exception,System.String)
member.summary: Handles a simple error. If the error is a foundation error it will be passed along by the catch calling this method. Otherwise the error will be logged, wraped in a DALException and rethrown.

member.name: M:Litium.Foundation.Data.MSSQL.DataProvider.HandleError(System.Exception,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction)
member.summary: Handles an error with transaction. If the error is a foundation error it will passed along by the catch calling this method after a transaction roll back. Otherwise the error will be logged, wraped in a DALException and rethrown after a transaction roll back (Error has to be logged before transaction roll back).

member.remarks: SP_GET_GROUP_MEMBERSHIPS returns recordsets in following format and order: GroupRecordset0[] GroupRecordset1[] . . If include permissions is true. CustomPermissionRecordset0[] CustomPermissionRecordset1[] . ModulePermissionRecordset0[] ModulePermissionRecordset1[] . SolutionPermissionRecordset0[] SolutionPermissionRecordset1[] . . If include members is true. MemberRecordset0[] MemberRecordset1[] . .

member.summary: Overrides the language ID for domains that are not multi-lingual. For simplicity and in the sake of upholding a high degree of usability for outside developers one should always set the LanguageId of the to the language ID string value of the current context, and then let this override take care of parsing the correct language identifier.
member.param: The string representation of the language ID of the current context.
member.returns: Guid.Empty.ToString() if the domain is not multi-lingual, otherwise the language ID string representation of the current language context.

member.name: M:Litium.Foundation.Accounts.NovellEDirectory.NovellGroup.Sync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Synchronizes the group with the Novell Directory: - Updates the corresponding Foundation group with the Novell display name. - If the Novell group no longer exists, the corresponding Foundation group is disabled. - Checks that all members registred in Foundation still exist and that they are members of the group. If not, these users are removed from the memberships list.
member.param: Login name used to verify group against the Novell Directory.
Password used to verify group against the Novell Directory.

member.name: M:Litium.Foundation.Accounts.NovellEDirectory.NovellGroup.Sync
member.summary: Synchronizes the group with the Novell Directory: - Updates the corresponding Foundation group with the Novell display name. - If the Novell group no longer exists, the corresponding Foundation group is disabled. - Checks that all members registred in Foundation still exist and that they are members of the group. If not, these users are removed from the memberships list.

member.name: M:Litium.Foundation.Accounts.NovellEDirectory.NovellUser.#ctor(Litium.Foundation.Carriers.UserCarrier)
member.param: User carrier. LoginName = cn. Path = complete Novell Directory LDAP path (example: "LDAP://litium.se/CN=Domain Users,CN=Users,DC=litium,DC=se").

member.name: M:Litium.Foundation.Accounts.NovellEDirectory.NovellUser.Sync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Synchronizes the user with the Novell Directory: - Updates the corresponding Foundation user with the Novell display name and email. - If the Novell user no longer exists, the corresponding Foundation user is disabled. - Checks that all members registred in Foundation still exist and that they are members of the group. If not, these users are removed from the memberships list.
member.param: Login name used to verify group against the Novell Directory.
Password used to verify group against the Novell Directory.

member.name: M:Litium.Foundation.Accounts.NovellEDirectory.NovellUser.Sync
member.summary: Synchronizes the user with the Novell Directory: - Updates the corresponding Foundation user with the Novell display name and email. - If the Novell user no longer exists, the corresponding Foundation user is disabled. - Checks that all members registred in Foundation still exist and that they are members of the group. If not, these users are removed from the memberships list.

member.summary: Handle the background process to update the pageinformation and get new statistics

member.name: M:Litium.Foundation.Log.ScheduledTasks.LogTruncateScheduler.ExecuteTask(Litium.Foundation.Security.SecurityToken,System.String)
member.summary: Invoked on a timer event (scheduled tasks) or on startup. Sample: "Litium.Foundation.Log.ScheduledTasks.LogTruncateScheduler;00:00;1h;Debug=0&Info=1&Warn=10&Error=10&Fatal=-1&MaxCount=50000" Run the truncate every hour, removing all DEBUG entries, keeping 1 day of INFO, 10 days of WARN and ERROR and unlimited old FATAL items, but maximum of 50000 log entries.
